meanings.definition: A thin layer of material used to cover the surface of an object for decoration or protection.
meanings.sent1: The furniture maker applied veneers to the tabletop for a glossy finish.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully glued the veneers onto the cabinet doors.
meanings.sent3: The artist playfully arranged the veneers on the sculpture, creating a colorful mosaic effect.
meanings.sent4: The sunlight danced on the veneers of the mirror, reflecting a shimmering pattern on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The delicate veneers on the jewelry box added an elegant touch to the room.

meanings.definition: A cosmetic dental treatment in which a thin layer of material is bonded to the front surface of a tooth.
meanings.sent1: She decided to get veneers to improve the appearance of her smile.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended veneers to cover the stains on his patient's teeth.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his veneers were so bright they could light up a room.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared after getting veneers, feeling like a movie star with a perfect smile.
meanings.sent5: The bride's veneers sparkled in the wedding photos, enhancing her beauty on her special day.
